Judul: TELESCOPE OPPONENTS FIGHTS THE PROCESS NOT SCIENCE
Abstrak:
Around the time that Hawaiian society reached its zenith for navigation and sustainable agriculture and aquaculture, the Catholic Church in Europe was persecuting the astronomer Galileo Galilei for his support of heliocentrism. No wonder those of
us challenging the construction of the Thirty Meter Telescope (TMT) today reject the notion that we are opposing science.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
